posts.description: Prosecutors file additional charges against inauguration protesters - The Washington Post
posts.extended: Prosecutors on Thursday filed additional charges against more than 200 protesters who were arrested during President Trump’s inauguration in January.

As the news industry has grappled with a tectonic shift in how news is consumed in the era of social media, one particularly intriguing trend is the way in which journalists themselves have integrated social content into their reporting.

posts.description: Power struggle between regime, Kurdish Self-Administration plays out in region’s largest public hospital - Syria Direct
posts.extended: AMMAN: In the northeastern reaches of Syria’s Kurdish-controlled territory, a months-long row between local political forces is bringing operations at the area’s largest hospital to a near-total standstill.
